title: Sigur Ros Discography
description:
This is simply my collection of all of the Sigur RÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â³s albums and EPs that I could find. I&#039;ve probably put this all together over the period of a few weeks, and I thought I&#039;d share what I had with TPB, seeing as I tried to find a torrent exactly like this when I first fell in love with this group.

It includes the following official Sigur RÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â³s albums - 


Von (1997) - Their first and strangest album, I like it.

ÃƒÆ’?gÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¦tis byrjun (1999)- My personal favourite.

( ) (2002) - Untitled, all in &#039;hopelandic&#039;, which means no lyrics, just vocals that sound vaguely like Icelandic

Takk... (2005) - Their newest material, which I don&#039;t like as much, most of the songs sound the same to me.


Also a few side projects, EPs, and Soundtracks

RÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â­mur EP (2001) - a very rare EP, 1000 copies were released and sold on an Icelandic Tour. I&#039;ve uploaded a torrent of this as a standalone. Good luck finding it anywhere else.

SÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¦glÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â³pur EP (2006) - A japan only EP

Hlemmur Soundtrack (2007) - Instrumental soundtrack to an Icelandic documentary about the homeless population in ReykjavÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â­k

Hvarf-Heim (2007)- Sort of a compilation album, but has some good new material.
(Unannounced New Studio Album - I&#039;ll include this once I can obtain it)


The Following material is NOT included in this torrent, for various reasons : 

Hrafnagaldr ÃƒÆ’?ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â°ins - A symphony of sorts, I believe. I have yet to find a solid release of this. 

Popp ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â­ ReykjavÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â­k - a documentary on Icelandic music featuring Sigur RÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â³s, as far as I can tell just songs from the albums I have on here.

Angels of the Universe Soundtrack - They contributed two songs. Good movie, download it, or the soundtrack, it&#039;s all on TPB.

Heima - A film, and there are plenty of torrents of it everywhere. I reccomend it.

Ba Ba Ti Ki Di Do EP - a three song EP that I have been unable to find, but it sounds amazing. Three independent songs, that if played at the same time form another song. Similar to the Flaming Lips project &#039;Zaireeka&#039;. If anyone can find this, PLEASE let me know.

Von brigÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â°i - The recycled album. Remixes. I&#039;m not a fan of that kind of material, but I&#039;d give it a chance.

All of their Singles - I find it kinda pointless, it&#039;s just songs that were on their albums.

I&#039;ll try and get as much as I can of the material I don&#039;t have and update this torrent, if that&#039;s possible. Sort of new to uploading, sorry if you disagree with my comments on each of the albums. But this is the core material of Sigur RÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â³s, and I hope you like it.
